testimonials.name: Marcus Johnson
testimonials.quote: Mystros gave me the skills and confidence to open my own shop. The instructors are true professionals who care about your success.

testimonials.name: Anthony Williams
testimonials.quote: The hands-on training at Mystros is unmatched. From day one, you're learning real skills with real clients. Best decision I ever made.

testimonials.name: Jessica Martinez
testimonials.quote: As a cosmetologist, the crossover program helped me expand my skills quickly. Now I can serve all my clients' needs. The flexible schedule made it possible while I kept working.

testimonials.name: DeShawn Carter
testimonials.quote: Eros and the team at Mystros believe in second chances. They helped me turn my life around and build a real career. Forever grateful.
